Vanity Belle Beauty Boutique in La Jolla, CA

  • All vendors
  • Hair and make-up
  • [ Vanity Belle Beauty Boutique ]

Address, phone and e-mail

(858) 876-5776 (858) 876-5776
237 Prospect Ave. Suite U, La Jolla, CA 92037

www.thevanitybelle.com
info@thevanitybelle.com

Message Vendor

Message the vendor to check their availability, ask a question or request a quote. Once the vendor responds, you will receive a notification sent to the email you specify below. Your email address will not be shared with the vendor unless you choose to include it in your message.

About Vanity Belle Beauty Boutique

With eco-friendly boutiques in Costa Mesa and La Jolla, Vanity Belle creates a one-stop, upscale experience for all your blowdry bar, lash, makeup, salon and beauty needs. Our experienced and insured professionals, bring you the latest trends and styles in the bridal and beauty industry to you!

Awards

Wedding Wire - Couples' Choice Awards (2015, 2016, 2017), As Featured On Style Me Pretty 2013

Additional Information
